name: Version 2022.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update version by @chrisrichardson in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/96
* Push docs to FEniCS/docs by @jhale in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/98
* Fix push to pypi by @jhale in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/100
* Editable installs with --user has been fixed with `pip.__version__`>=21.3.0 by @jorgensd in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/104
* Use subscripts in place of superscripts by @dham in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/105
* Change DOLFINx integration test image by @jhale in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/110
* Fix lint by @dham in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/112
* Fix signature for forms with identitcal constants and identical meshes (up to ufl_id) by @jorgensd in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/113


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/compare/2022.1.0.post0...2022.2.0

name: Version 2022.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove now unnecessary travis config by @wence- in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/54
* Fix algorithmic scaling with number of subdomains for __rmul__ by @wence- in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/53
* Fix derivative index simplification by @wence- in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/52
* Add prism cell by @chrisrichardson in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/58
* Add pyramid by @jmv2009 in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/59
* Fix doc building for modern sphinx by @wence- in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/64
* Transform global derivatives of Jacobian to reference derivatives in `preprocessed_form` by @jpdean in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/63
* Catch users who try to index UFL expressions with negative indices by @pefarrell in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/66
* Fix the docstring for dot by @lrtfm in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/67
* Refactor pullback application by @wence- in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/68
* Performance improvements for transformations by @wence- in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/69
* Allow variant hints to be passed into VectorElement and TensorElement by @mscroggs in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/71
* Add set of continuous families not requiring a restriction by @jorgensd in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/73
* Create FUNDING.yml by @jhale in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/75
* Add function to get the `ufl.Cell` corresponding to a cell's facet by @jpdean in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/76
* Remove cellname2facetname by @jpdean in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/77
* Wence/reconstruct tp by @wence- in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/78
* Modernise Python packaging by @jhale in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/79
* Add Python 3.10 to Actions CI by @garth-wells in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/85
* Add workflow to run DOLFINx and FFCx tests by @mscroggs in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/86
* Parse multiple expressions by @michalhabera in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/74
* Add functions to strip and attach data references in forms by @connorjward in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/55
* Make UFL files Python by @michalhabera in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/90
* Update syntax for wheel build by @jhale in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/91
* Signature computation speedup by @michalhabera in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/94

## New Contributors
* @jmv2009 made their first contribution in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/59
* @jpdean made their first contribution in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/63
* @lrtfm made their first contribution in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/67
* @mscroggs made their first contribution in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/71
* @jhale made their first contribution in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/75
* @michalhabera made their first contribution in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/74
* @connorjward made their first contribution in https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/pull/55

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FEniCS/ufl/compare/2021.1.0...2022.1.0
